original_text: And the word of God continued to increase, and the number of the disciples multiplied greatly in Jerusalem, and a great many of the priests became obedient to the faith.
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀이 점점 왕성하여 예루살렘에 있는 제자의 수가 더 심히 많아지고 허다한 제사장의 무리도 이 도에 복종하니라

sentences.original_text: And the word of God continued to increase
and the number of the disciples multiplied greatly in Jerusalem
and a great many of the priests became obedient to the faith.
